ns2:test-suite.name: As a Amazon user I should be able to login and logout with valid credentials

test-case.name: Login into the application and search for flights
test-case.title: Login into the application and search for flights

step.name: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.tripadvisor.in/"
step.title: Given I am on the Login page URL "https://www.tripadvisor.in/"

step.name: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page for Tripadvisor
step.title: Then I click on sign in button and wait for sign in page for Tripadvisor

step.name: Then I should see Sign In Page
step.title: Then I should see Sign In Page

step.name: When I click on Continue with email button
step.title: When I click on Continue with email button

step.name: And I click on Log in button of Tripadvisor
step.title: And I click on Log in button of Tripadvisor

step.name: Then I am logged in on Tripadvsior
step.title: Then I am logged in on Tripadvsior

step.name: Then I click on Flight link and verify to be on flight booking page
step.title: Then I click on Flight link and verify to be on flight booking page

step.name: Then I enter from destination as "Mumbai"
step.title: Then I enter from destination as "Mumbai"

step.name: And I enter to destination as "Delhi"
step.title: And I enter to destination as "Delhi"

label.value: Login into the application and search for flights
